title: Team Synergy [LFM]
body:
_**--TEAM SYNERGY--**_

The prestigious eSports community and team is looking to recruit.
Do you have what it takes to join this revolutionary addition to the eSports scene.

**Do's and dont's:**

**DO:**

* Be chill
* Laidback
* Down to earth
* Good at league
* Silver +
* Mature
* Funny cunt
* Available
* More than 2k instagram followers

**DON'T**

* Pretend to be high
* Start biffs
* Be bad at league

So if you still believe you have what it takes we are looking for one core member and or possible filler.
Add "Meme Machine" or comment here.

replies.body:
Can we change 2k+ instagram follows for "dank maymays master"

pwease?
